reuters.title: U.S. CONSUMER CREDIT ROSE 1.77 BILLION DLRS IN FEB VS REVISED 789 MLN JAN GAIN
reuters.body: (Sportscene Restaurants Inc) said it acquired (Cafe Christophe Van Houtte Inc), a cafe chain with ten franchises and one corporate restaurant, for an unspecified amount of cash and Sportscene shares. Reuter 
